data.title: A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court by Mark Twain Paperback Book
data.meta_description: The novel is a biting satire on the romanticized notions of chivalry, feudalism, and the Middle Ages. A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court by Mark Twain. Mark Twain (30 November 1835- 21 April 1910) was born in Florida, United States.
data.text: Will ship within 10 business days of receiving cleared payment. The seller has specified an extended handling time for this item.
